author: weaver
msg: Relative to enhancement bug id's17747 and 17756.
The MVC portlet api will allow developers to create template-portlets from a single
base class as opposed to previously having to extending entirely different classes
based on the view/template technology that was to be implemented.
-GenericMVCPortlet: view-agnostic portlet for template-based presentation development.
Easily replaces all JspPortlet/VelocityPortlet classes and sub-classes.
-PortletAction: Extends PortletActionEvent and provides support for event execution.
-GenericMVCAction: Concrete implementation of the PortletAction.  Should be used in combination
- view processors: These classes are used by the MVCPortlet to render content base on the "viewtype"

author: morciuch

author: morciuch

author: morciuch

author: morciuch
msg: Added feature to log portlet load time in place of bytes sent in the portlet stats service (see Bugzilla issue# 17632).
This feature is disabled by default (see logLoadTime in jr.props)
